name: 亚当·希夫
birth_place: 美国,马萨诸塞州,弗雷明汉
introduction: Adam Schiff was born on June 20, 1960 in Framingham, Massachusetts, USA. He is married to Eve Schiff. They have two children.Was a lawyer, working as an assistant prosecutor in the Los Angeles branch of the U.S. Attorney's Office.Received a political science degree from Stanford University and a law degree from Harvard University.Father of son Elijah Schiff and daughter Alexa Schiff.California state senator, 1996-2001.Democrat U.S. Congressional representative from California, 3 January 2001 - present.Member, U.S. House Intelligence Committee.
